Paloma Faith's newborn baby - who she welcomed in February - is in hospital with an infection.
The Better Than This hitmaker, 39, revealed that she was seeking professional medical care for her litt… [+4431 chars]

articles.author: Helen Kelly
articles.title: 'GMB is finished without Piers' Viewers switch off as Charlotte and Alex host GMB - Express
articles.description: GOOD MORNING BRITAIN viewers claimed they were 'switching over' to BBC Breakfast as Charlotte Hawkins and Alex Beresford presented the bank holiday instalment.
